title: Plain Number Implementations - AssemblyScript
description: Convert plain number implementations from JavaScript to AssemblyScript in src/wasm/plain/. These are high-performance numeric operations with Very High WASM priority.

tasks.description: Convert src/plain/number/arithmetic.js to src/wasm/plain/arithmetic.ts - Basic arithmetic operations (add, subtract, multiply, divide) for plain numbers
Convert src/plain/number/constants.js to src/wasm/plain/constants.ts - Mathematical constants (PI, E, etc.)
Convert src/plain/number/bitwise.js to src/wasm/plain/bitwise.ts - Bitwise operations for plain numbers
Convert src/plain/number/trigonometry.js to src/wasm/plain/trigonometry.ts - Trig functions for plain numbers
Convert remaining src/plain/number/*.js files to src/wasm/plain/*.ts - Complete plain number implementation suite

acceptanceCriteria: All plain number implementations converted to AssemblyScript
AssemblyScript compilation succeeds (asc builds without errors)
Unit tests pass for all converted functions
